historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-139, see notes following § 50-2701.

DC CODE § 50-2708

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: This chapter shall apply to all vehicles towed by a private tow company under § 50-2702(a) after June 22, 2006.

This chapter shall also apply to all vehicles towed prior to June 22, 2006; provided, that notice is sent to the owners in accordance with § 50- 2702(a) or published in a newspaper of general circulation in accordance with § 50-2702(b).

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

subtitle.text: Vehicles on Public and Private Space.
